import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import Layout from '../../../pages/admin_layout' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Categories = ({ categories, data }) => { const { id } = useParams(); const getAmountProduct = (id) => { const amount = data.find(element => element.id == id); console.log(amount); } const section = <> {categories.map((category, index) => )}
Id Name Amount Delete/Edit
{category.id} {category.name} {getAmountProduct()}
return ( <> ) } export default Categories
